subject: No tracking number
description_text:
Hi there,

I ordered a set of VAM Pro Set (2 pac/includes power supply) and Plus X
Pedal Control Box on order number #SSN2786. I paid for standard shipping
and it's been over a week now and I still haven't received any sort of
tracking number or ETA for my order to arrive. I would have thought to have
them by now or at least have the tracking number to know when they will be
arriving.

Are you able to give me any sort of update as to when my order will arrive?

Many thanks,
Matt

conversations.body_text: Hi Matt DC,    We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. Your order has been shipped, and here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045959302683
